articles.title: Garbiñe Muguruza advances to Shenzhen Open semifinals
articles.description: SHENZHEN, China (AP) — Sixth-seeded Garbiñe Muguruza advanced to the semifinals at the Shenzhen Open by beating Zarina Diyas 6-4, 2-6, 6-4 on Thursday.
articles.content:
SHENZHEN, China (AP) Sixth-seeded Garbiñe Muguruza advanced to the semifinals at the Shenzhen Open by beating Zarina Diyas 6-4, 2-6, 6-4 on Thursday.
The two-time Grand Slam champion from Spain had 13 aces, including seven in the final set.

articles.title: UN-supported Libya government welcomes civil war truce calls
articles.description: CAIRO (AP) — Libya’s United Nations-supported government has welcomed Russian and Turkish calls for a ceasefire amid the country’s ongoing civil war, though its rivals appeared cool to the intervention and refrained from endorsing the idea Thursday.
